situation.title: Shopping malls
situation.meta_description: Only shops carrying essential goods will be open in shopping centers - especially grocery stores, pharmacies and drugstores.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Only shops carrying essential goods will be open in shopping malls - especially grocery stores, pharmacies and drugstores. Other shops will remain closed. In shopping centers with a sales area of more than 5 000 m2 catering facilities are allowed to be open.

Shopping malls can be entered in a group of max. 2 people. The exception being children under 15 accompanied by an adult from the same household (typically parents, grandparents or siblings living with the child).

The Wi-Fi in shopping malls is turned off and it isn't possible to use the rest areas (such as benches, chairs, seats …).
